backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining Habit/HabitView types, CRUD operations (addHabit, checkIn, getHabits, getHabit), sorting utilities, and initial dummy habit seeding, with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Motoko migration module that maps old actor state to new actor state, preserving habits and nextHabitId with a no-op habit transformation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the HabitList empty-state UI update feature to its affected file and test requirement REQ-2.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summary document describing the purpose of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Habit Tracker SPA, mounting the React app at #root and loading the main TSX entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with a root Layout route and two child routes: HabitsPage at / and SummaryPage at /summary.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with Habits, Summary, and disabled Settings tabs, highlighting the active route with primary color styling.
frontend/src/components/CheckInButton.ts: Compact 44px circular button that shows a checkmark image when checked in, a muted circle for past dates, and an interactive ring button for today with a loading spinner.
frontend/src/components/DateStrip.tsx: Horizontally scrollable week strip (Mon–Sun) with circular day buttons that highlight today with a border and the selected date with a filled primary background.
frontend/src/components/FAB.tsx: Circular floating action button fixed bottom-left above the bottom nav, triggering an onClick callback to open the add-habit modal.
frontend/src/components/HabitCard.tsx: Full-width habit card with cycling pastel background, emoji icon, habit name/description, check-in count, and a CheckInButton, with strikethrough styling when checked in.
frontend/src/components/HabitForm.tsx: Controlled form for creating a new habit with name and optional description inputs, calling useAddHabit on submit and invoking an optional onSuccess callback.
frontend/src/components/HabitFormModal.t: A bottom-sheet modal component that wraps HabitForm for creating a new habit, closing the sheet on success or dismiss.
frontend/src/components/HabitList.tsx: Renders a list of HabitCard components for a selected date, auto-seeding placeholder habits if none exist, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout with a sticky header, bottom navigation, optional footer, and a router Outlet for page content.
frontend/src/components/StreakDisplay.ts: Displays the current and longest check-in streaks for a habit using the useStreakCalculation hook.
frontend/src/components/WeeklySummary.ts: Shows a weekly stats dashboard with total check-ins, completion rate, active habit count, and a per-habit breakdown with progress bars.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) via React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDateCheckIn.ts: Returns a boolean indicating whether any check-in timestamp falls within a given target date's day boundaries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context with login/logout, identity state, and status flags via a React context and AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching habits, adding a habit, checking in, and seeding placeholder habits via the ICP backend actor.
Calculates the current and longest consecutive daily check-in streaks from an array of nanosecond timestamps.
frontend/src/hooks/useTodayCheckIn.ts: Returns a boolean indicating whether the last check-in timestamp falls within today's date range.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeeklySummary.ts: Computes weekly stats (total check-ins, completion rate, per-habit unique-day counts) for the past 7 days from a list of habits.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, including pastel colors and utility classes for shadows and safe-area padding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/HabitsPage.tsx: Main habits page component that renders a date strip for navigation, a habit list for the selected date, and a FAB that opens a modal for adding new habits.
frontend/src/pages/SummaryPage.tsx: Summary page that displays the WeeklySummary component showing the user's habit progress over the past 7 days.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with OKLCH color tokens, custom font sizes, Inter font family, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking version, existing features, and pending feature requests—specifically adding placeholder/demo habits pre-populated in the backend canister on initialization.
